title: Emergency work flexibility for student crises
description: Emergency work flexibility for student crises
content:
Scenario: Emergency work flexibility for student crises
    Given students face emergencies (illness, family crisis, housing instability)
    And rigid work schedules can worsen crises
    When Kenji experiences emergency situation
    Then the workplace_elohim should help him communicate need for emergency time off
    And it should advocate for employer flexibility during crisis
    And it should recognize emergency accommodation as care economy practice
    And employers should support workers through crises
    And the system should help Kenji access emergency workplace support
    And care economy workplaces respond to worker emergencies with flexibility
